sentences.en: Anti - Psyker aura nullifies all enemy special abilities in their vicinity.
sentences.cn: 反 Psyker气味在他们的接近中取消所有的敌人特别的能力.

sentences.en: But the tough good - guy aura never quite remained.
sentences.cn: 可是那一股生硬的可亲气息却往往一瞬即逝.

sentences.en: Create an aura of mystery and join the rock -'n'- roll league of glamour.
sentences.cn: 以这款作品营造神秘诱人的风格,同时加入摇滚时尚的行列.

sentences.en: Improved Concentration Aura ( Protection ) moved to the Holy tree.
sentences.cn: 强化专注光环 ( 防护系 ) 移动到神圣系.

sentences.en: It was postmarked from London and had the faintest aura of grease.
sentences.cn: 从邮戳看是发自伦敦的,上面已经布满模糊混乱的油渍了.

sentences.en: Lose that aura, and it all goes into reverse.
sentences.cn: 但是如果没了这种气势, 一切都将向相反的方向发展了.

sentences.en: She always has an aura of confidence.
sentences.cn: 她总是满有信心的样子。

sentences.en: She always seems to have an aura of happiness about her.
sentences.cn: 她好像总是喜气洋洋的.

sentences.en: She had an aura of authority.
sentences.cn: 她给人一种很有权威的感觉。

sentences.en: Some Washington parties have a social aura about them.
sentences.cn: 华盛顿的晚会到处都有一种社交气氛.

sentences.en: That prodigious creature was a gloomy man, enveloped in a sad aura.
sentences.cn: 那个怪人是个愁容满面 、 郁郁寡欢的人.

sentences.en: The aura is perhaps the most talked about of the phases.
sentences.cn: 先兆期是被谈论最多的阶段.

sentences.en: The woods have an aura of mystery.
sentences.cn: 林子里有一种神秘的气氛.

sentences.en: There is an aura of divinity about him.
sentences.cn: 他有一股神圣不可侵犯的气息.

sentences.en: This aura of darkness clings to the tarot cards, even now.
sentences.cn: 即使到现在,这种黑暗的气氛仍依附于塔罗牌.

words.tran_cn: 听觉的；耳的；气味的；先兆的
光环；气氛；（中风等的）预兆；气味

phrases.tran_cn: 虔诚光环；专注光环；热血灵光

trans.tran_cn: 气味，光环，气氛，[医]（中风等的）预兆
trans.tran_en: a quality or feeling that seems to surround or come from a person or a place
